interestingcomments.content: Strange thing, as what I have done : copy the image address, then post with "image link", it shows up all time. --img--  That appears to be a malfunction. It seems that pasting a link to your own image produces an address which is shown to everyone and not just the logged-in users.
interestingcomments.MarkedSent: Strange thing, as what I have done : copy the image address, then post with "image link", it shows up all time. --img--  That appears to be a malfunction. It seems that pasting a link to your own image produces an address which is shown to everyone and not just the logged-in users.
